name: 4 Pack Women’s Maternity Leggings with Pockets Over The Belly Butt Lift - Soft Workout Pregnancy Yoga Pants
short_description: Convenient Dual-Pocket Design: Our maternity leggings are not just stylish but also practical. Two deep pockets are strategically placed on each side, allowing you to carry essentials like your phone, keys, or small baby items conveniently, so pregnancy women can get hands free and pay more attention to their babies.The added convenience of pockets enhances the functionality, making them suitable for any activity.

High Waist Bump Support & Butt Lift : Experience comfort and support for your growing belly from the first trimester through the postpartum period. with our specially designed over the belly high maternity waistband makes your body looks more slim and butt lifting. The elastic band gently cradles your bump, providing the necessary support without compromising on style.

Premium Soft & Stretch Fabric: Crafted from a blend of 92% poleyster, 8% spandex , our maternity pants offer a cream soft and 4 way stretch feel((around the belly and in the back) . The fabric adapts to your changing body shape, ensuring a snug fit throughout your pregnancy while providing the flexibility you need for workout or casual wear.

Versatile Wear Pregnancy Leggings: Whether you're heading out for a walk, running errands, yoga or just relaxing at home, these maternity leggings with pockets are the perfect companion. Enjoy full-length coverage for your legs, providing breathable and moisture-wicking feel in any weather. These pants are versatile enough for year-round wear, the timeless design allows you to pair them effortlessly with a variety of tops, ensuring you look and feel great during this special time.

100% Customer Service : We are devoted to achieving 100% customer service satisfaction. Your satisfaction is our topmost priority. If you don't like leggings or have any problem please contact us, we’ll reply to you in 24 hours.These stylish and comfy women’s shorts make a great gift to yourself or as a birthday, anniversary, holiday, or Christmas gift to a spouse.
